inicio.titulo: Leading distributor of the best brands in technology and home appliances
inicio.subtitulo: Specialists in offline and online channels, providing exceptional experiences in prices and products.
inicio.descripcion: Space Brands is a leader in the distribution of technology and home appliances in LATAM, with more than 20 years of experience in Retail. We connect leading brands with retailers and marketplaces, managing a portfolio of over 500 products.

elementos.descripcion: We unify online and offline sales channels, maximizing the impact of our brands. Our distribution network and alliances with over 30 retailers and marketplaces ensure a strong market presence.

We collaborate with technology leaders, ensuring constant innovation. Our platforms manage over 10,000 SKUs, projecting to exceed 30,000 monthly transactions by 2025, improving delivery times and customer experience.
With consolidated operations in LATAM, we are ready to expand in the region. In Bolivia, our OEM model positions us as leaders in customized products.
We apply smart investments that ensure competitive prices and constant annual growth, guaranteeing a 15% TEA profitability for partners and investors.

servicios.descripcion: We develop cutting-edge technological products designed for the local market, from concept to implementation.

elementos.descripcion: With over 50 agents specialized in direct sales and dropshipping, we launch national campaigns that increase the visibility of our brands and maximize return on investment for partners.
We manage over 1,000 online and offline sales points, optimizing inventories with advanced tools to ensure the right product availability at the right time and place.
We provide technical support nationwide, with a 97% customer satisfaction rate, thanks to fast and efficient response times for distributors and consumers.

socios.descripcion: Space Brands colabora con más de 30 retailers y marketplaces, asegurando una cobertura de distribución integral y una presencia sólida en los principales canales de venta.

cobertura.descripcion: Space Brands garantiza una distribución eficiente y puntual en más de 400 puntos de venta físicos de nuestros aliados y/o partners en todo el Perú. Nuestra estrategia logística cubre el 100% del territorio nacional, optimizando tiempos y costos para ofrecer un servicio integral.

tecnologia.descripcion: Our focus on technology and innovation allows us to manage over 300,000 annual transactions. With advanced data analysis tools, we optimize inventory, logistics, and sales, enhancing customer experience and maximizing operational efficiency.

elementos.descripcion: We make data-driven decisions that improve inventory turnover and optimize product management.
We automate shipments, pricing, and catalogs on major marketplaces, reducing human errors by 90%.
